TopicTitle: How do you make self-made kerbal head skins for texture replacer?

Articles.Content: I want to make some texture replacer stuff, so im just wondering how to make heads?

15 minutes ago, Sky Kerman said:

so im just wondering how to make heads?

Take a look in Texture Replacer's Skins/TR folder/ Each sub folder is a texture map of a different kerbal head.  To create you own simply copy one of these texture files as a template and edit them and alter to your liking.  Experiment until you get something you like. 

The files are in .dds format so they are upside down. Paint.net is a pretty good free image editor that supports .dds format.

2 minutes ago, Caerfinon said:

Thanks so much!
